mapper.select: SELECT RTname FROM Restaurant WHERE RTnumber = #{RTnumber};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(RVnumber, Mid, RTnumber, RTname, RVtitle, RVcontent, RVcount, RVdate, RVimgname, RVimgpath, RVimgsize) VALUES(Review_RVnumber_seq.nextval, #{Mid}, #{RTnumber}, #{RTname}, #{RVtitle}, #{RVcontent}, #{RVcount}, SYSDATE, #{RVimgname}, #{RVimgpath}, #{RVimgsize})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM review ORDER BY RVnumber DESC) a) b WHERE b.rnum >=#{startRow} AND b.rnum <=#{endRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET RVcount=RVcount+1 WHERE RVnumber=#{RVnumber}
